attributes.action: Deport Altaf Hussain for spreading Terror from the shores of UK
attributes.additional_details:
Altaf Hussain is a party leader of MQM who has been given British Citizenship by the UK Government. He lives on UK Tax payers benefits and is spreading hatred and violence through hate speech in Pakistan (Karachi). He has also been subject to multiple crimes in the UK such as murder of Dr.Imran Farooq and Money laundering. Recently, Pakistan's interior Minister has handed over evidences to the British High Commissioner in Pakistan.
We want UK government to kick him out of this country and put him on trial so that people can live peacefully.
